text: Dareka bhala'i purva ane pasrcima tarapha modhum karavamam ja nathi parantu kharekhara saro vyakti te che je allaha ta'ala para, kayamatana divasa para, pharista'o para, allahani kitaba para ane payagambaro para imana dharave che, je dhanathi muhabbata karava chatam saga-sambadhi'o, yatimo, lacaro, musapharo ane manganarane ape, dasone chodave, namajani pabandi kare ane jhakata apato rahe, jyare vacana kare tyare tene puru kare, apatti, dunkhadarda ane jhaghada vakhate dhiraja rakhe, a ja saca loko che ane a ja daranara'o che
